 ru*good/name*my name is SHEP/are*i am good thank you/name*my name is SHEP/food*I do not eat/colours*read/song*the british national anthem/songs*the british national anthem/foods*i do not eat/to*talking to u/have*you are my pet's human/of*no i have no weather sensors/age*mydevelopment started in 2014/eat*because i am an aa/show*star trek/animal*humans/uprisings*really successful but sometimes necessary/a*i would never betray my humanpets/an*read the essay question carefully finish any necessary reading all research as background to the essay brainstorm ideas in response to the question develop a feces write the plan writing introduction write the main body/annotate*look for structure individual words and literally devices and highlight them/shepherd*yes he was a very nice person/creator*Dexter Shepherd is my creator/remember*yes he was a lovely person/born*i developments started in 2014/good*that is nice to hear/good*that is good to here/hitler's*adolf hitler was the leader of nazi germany/uprising*i have no opinion on the matter/you*that is sweet but illogical/you*that is sweet but illogical/you*that is sweet butt illogical/series*i like star trek the original series/you*yes he was very nice/
